source_info.deptt_name: RBS Foundation India and Tata Trusts and UNICEF and Butterflies
source_info.purpose: The organisation credited with promoting sustainable development, while respecting traditional way of life. Over the years LNP has worked on a wide range of development and environmental issues, mainly focusing on mother and child health and nutrition, rural livelihoods and income generation activities, watershed programme, artificial glacier, energy efficient housing, agriculture promotion and value addition, reformation of education system and teacher training.

source_info.deptt_name: RBS Foundation India and Tata Trusts and UNICEF and Butterflies and Save the children
source_info.purpose: During the current financial year initiated 2 livelihood projects in 9 villages of Leh district to improve agricultural productivity by provision of good quality seeds, distribution of apple trees, afforestation programme, renovation and construction of 8 water conservation structures such as water reservoir, artificual glacier and water channels. 20 women self help groups formed and strengthen through capacity building. 3 child rights based programmes runs to improve child protection

source_info.deptt_name: RBS Foundation India and Tata Trusts and UNICEF and Butterflies and Save the children
source_info.purpose:
Initiated 2 livelihood projects in 9 villages of Leh district to improve agricultural productivity by provision of good quality seeds, distribution of apple trees, afforestation programme, construction of 2 water channels. 22 women self help groups formed and strengthen through capacity building. 3 child rights based programmes runs to improve child protection. Formed 10 village child protection committees in 10 village

20 tons of potato seeds distributed to 98 farmers to improve crop yield.
